topics.body:
WOAHWOAHWOAH

So Goku beats Chichi, she tells him who she is, he remembers, and realizes he agreed to marrying her, thinking it had something to do with food

But then once he realizes his mistake, he asks her to marry him anyways!?

That's how they got together!?
That's it!?

I really enjoy the show but at the same time you have a point.

Like its NEVER a good idea to let a show go on too long. Or else you'll run out of ideas.

Just look at what happened to the Simpsons and Family Guy. Hopefully though that doesn't happen and the show continues to have good quality!

topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55066f656368724e163c0100#post_55066f656368724e163c0100
[bq="PaskaNaakka"]If they can keep the show good, they can make all the seasons they can possibly make

And then we wait for g5 after that like true believers[/bq]
*Most* tv shows tend to start going bad after either 5 or 7 seasons depending on the show.

What I mean by this is that if season 5 is okay then it probably has another 2 good seasons left in it; if it's meh then the show will probably start going stale.
